price: Trego mëshirë, urdhëro vepra të mira dhe shmangu nga të paditurit!
arabic: خُذِ ٱلۡعَفۡوَ وَأۡمُرۡ بِٱلۡعُرۡفِ وَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنِ ٱلۡجَٰهِلِينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: khudhi al-ʿafwa wamur bil-ʿur'fi wa-aʿriḍ ʿani al-jāhilīna
